New discounts hit Apple iPads, even the new mini 7 - Image credit: Apple

Amazon's weekend deals see price cuts on the brand-new iPad mini 7, along with discounts on the 10th Gen, M4 iPad Pro and 2024 iPad Air.

Save up to $200 across the iPad lineup

Select models from Apple's entire iPad range are marked down at Apple resellers this weekend, with the new iPad mini 7 seeing its first double-digit discount at Amazon.

If you're willing to shop outside of Amazon, you can save up to $25 on every model at Adorama with promo code APINSIDER. The same APINSIDER code also knocks $10 off two years of AppleCare, bringing the cost down to $59. To apply the code, use the orange Add to Cart button, then proceed to checkout and look for a link in Step 4 of checkout to display the promo code field. Adorama is a NYC-based Apple Authorized Reseller that has been in business since 1974.

All of the deals are broken down by configuration in our iPad mini 7 Price Guide for easy scanning across the Wi-Fi Only and Wi-Fi + Cellular models.

The iPad 10th Generation has also been marked down at Amazon, falling to $298 in Blue and Silver. The $298 price reflects a $51 discount off MSRP and $21 savings over Amazon's price earlier this week.

Both the 10th Gen and mini 7 are in stock at Amazon at press time if you need the device right away.

I've compiled a list of the trending markdowns below, which includes savings on the current M4 iPad Pro, Apple Pencil, and blowout savings on last-gen models. You can also find a roundup of the top offers on our iPad deals page and in our iPad Price Guide.
